reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Strengthening Raqqa Local Administration to Support the Rural Communities

description.narrative: L’iniziativa mira a sostenere la stabilizzazione delle comunità rurali nel Nord Siria, aumentandone la resilienza. L’intervento mira, inoltre, a incoraggiare la riconciliazione tra le popolazioni di diversa etnia e religione, incentivandone il dialogo e gli scambi economici.

The intervention aims primary to strengthen the Local Council Associations in order to increase the resilience of the Rural Population around Raqqa and to support the stabilisation process in the involved areas through Technical Assistance, delivery of inputs and services using the revolving fund approach .

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
CIHEAM - CENTRO INTERNAZIONALE DI ALTI STUDI AGRONOMICI MEDITERRANEI

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
